rows.label: qst104224_msg0002
rows.name:
So the other day, we all tried
to go down to the beach...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0003
rows.name:
But there was a big rock washed up
in the way, and we couldn't get past!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0004
rows.name:
All three of us tried pushing it together,
but it didn't move an inch!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0005
rows.name:
In the end, Mason and some other
villagers helped us get it out of the way.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0006
rows.name:
But would you be able to move
a big rock like that all on your own?

rows.label: qst104224_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course! I can break through
all kinds of rocks, no problem.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0022
rows.name:
Wowwww! You'd smash them right up?!
I'd love to try that!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0023
rows.name:
Don't go trying anything dangerous,
now. Correl'll be really mad if you
get yourself hurt.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0024
rows.name: OK! I'll be careful not to get hurt!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0025
rows.name:
Is that all you wanted to ask, Kazuna?
I guess Kirk's next up, then.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0041
rows.name:
It would probably be easier to
break it than move it, but a rock
that big might be tough...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0042
rows.name:
Oh, I see... I guess even you'd have
to ask Mason for help, huh?

rows.label: qst104224_msg0043
rows.name:
Is that all you wanted to ask, Kazuna?
I guess Kirk's next up, then.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0101
rows.name:
You're not Rex!
C'mon, Rex, teach me stuff!
